arts.ttl: Finn Dahmen frustrates former club as Augsburg claim goalless draw at Mainz
arts.sum: Paul Nebel was particularly active, forcing a good save from Dahmen in the sixth minute. The match would prove to be largely a test of Mainz's attacking prowess against Augsburg's resilient defence, supported by the hosts' former goalkeeper.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Huge wins for Stuttgart, Freiburg and Union Berlin, goalless draws in Wolfsburg and Mainz
arts.sum: On a dramatic afternoon across the Bundesliga, VfB Stuttgart, Union Berlin and SC Freiburg secured huge wins to get their league form back on track, whilst goalless draws containing Mainz, Augsburg, Wolfsburg and Bayer Leverkusen questioned the respective European and title credentials of Mainz and Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Mainz 05 vs. Augsburg preview: Hosts out to continue red-hot home form
arts.sum: Mainz will attempt to record a sixth consecutive home victory when they play host to Augsburg on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Mainz bid emotional farewell to club-man Martin Schmidt: “Over a decade of solid work.”
arts.sum: Friday produced another emotional farewell at small market Bundesliga club FSV Mainz 05.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
